column4: I've pidgin and empathy and their plugin..they don't support webcam..I'm specifically looking for Yahoo Messenger to be running with its features..
Pidgin, amsn
empathy
some people have manage to run Yahoo Messenger with all its features using Wine
Tell me the native one..who can communicate with other yahoo contacts with webcam and voice chat?
r u sure? can Empathy connect with other yahoo contacts and do webcam and voice chat?
Maybe try gyachi... http://www.webupd8.org/2009/05/howto-linux-ubuntu-gyachi-yahoo.html
Let me look it over
Not sure if it works in 10.04 anymore
Np.
Not gyachi after all. Search google a bit for alternatives
I know what ya mean. Sometimes takes a lot of googling. I may have found an option or two. Just give me a bit to look them over, k?
http://gyachi.sourceforge.net/ <---- Try that. It seems like the only option besides kopete, pidgin, and empathy. Best I can do for you without ever trying one for yahoo
Ya, it looks like it's going to be quite the challenge indeed. Just try not to give up!
It seems there were a couple different variations of that client, but the link I gave you is the most recent I could find of the variations. I really hope it works for you
I guess you do have to install that
I remember seeing that person's name before and I believe they're the one that manages gyachi
Take your time. I'm trying to help, but I can't be much since I've never used that program before so can't vouch for it
How's that coming along?

Alright. I'm sorry if that doesn't work for you. I was having trouble sleeping and so figured I'd hop on here to try and help, but my brain is about ready for bed. I'll try and stay up a little longer to try and help :)
No need to thank me. Just trying to help where I can even if I'll be learning at the same time as you haha
That's the beauty of going from Windows to Ubuntu and just life in general. We need to take the opportunities to learn when given the chance. :P
how's that coming along? haven't heard from you in a little while
